fields.name: Tonkotsu ramen at Cocolo in Berlin
fields.comment: Great bowl! Rich broth, firm noodles, amazing pork belly

fields.name: Stamina Ramen at Makoto in Berlin
fields.comment: Decent bowl. Spicy broth, lots of pork belly slices and vegetables. Thin noodles, good but not firm enough.

fields.name: Sapporo Miso Ramen at Takumi Nine in Berlin
fields.comment: Very interesting. Rich miso broth with tasty, firm noodles. Tender chicken thigh and baby corn toppings. A bit pricey for Berlin.

fields.name: Tonkotsu Ramen at Makoto in Berlin
fields.comment: Very poor bowl, pretty bland broth, and dry chashu. Avoid!

fields.name: Tan Tan Ramen at Cocolo in Berlin
fields.comment: Very nice! Rich but not too heavy broth, decent amount of spicyness.
